entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 21 at 7:23PM MST until February 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills 20 to 30 degrees below zero with local values as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Cody Foothills and Big Horn Basin. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite
entry.cap:areaDesc: Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
